publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-769# Mr John Munro: The Cuillins—That the Parliament notes the unique position of the Cuillins in Scotland’s natural heritage; further notes the public debate about the legitimacy of the title and believes that it would be in the public interest to put the sale on hold until matters have been fully investigated.
S1M-769# The Cuillins (lodged on 20 April 2000) Fergus Ewing*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Nora Radcliffe*
S1M-769# The Black Cuillin (lodged on 20 April 2000) Brian Adam*, Michael Russell*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Mr Keith Raffan*, Ian Jenkins*, Mr Mike Rumbles*, George Lyon*, Christine Grahame*
S1M-769# The Black Cuillin (lodged on 20 April 2000) Shona Robison*

S1M-769# Mr John Munro: The Black Cuillin—That the Parliament notes the unique position of the Cuillins in Scotland’s natural heritage; further notes the public debate about the legitimacy of the title and believes that it would be in the public interest to put the sale on hold until matters have been fully investigated. Supported by: Fergus Ewing, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Nora Radcliffe, Brian Adam, Michael Russell, Mr Jamie Stone, Mr Keith Raffan, Ian Jenkins, Mr Mike Rumbles, George Lyon, Christine Grahame, Shona Robison
S1M-769# The Black Cuillin (lodged on 20 April 2000) Irene McGugan*
S1M-769# The Black Cuillin (lodged on 20 April 2000) Alex Neil*, Linda Fabiani*
S1M-769# The Black Cuillin (lodged on 20 April 2000) Scott Barrie*, Donald Gorrie*, Robin Harper*

S1M-769# Mr John Munro: The Black Cuillin—That the Parliament notes the unique position of the Cuillins in Scotland’s natural heritage; further notes the public debate about the legitimacy of the title and believes that it would be in the public interest to put the sale on hold until matters have been fully investigated. Supported by: Fergus Ewing, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Nora Radcliffe, Brian Adam, Michael Russell, Mr Jamie Stone, Mr Keith Raffan, Ian Jenkins, Mr Mike Rumbles, George Lyon, Christine Grahame, Shona Robison, Irene McGugan, Alex Neil, Linda Fabiani, Scott Barrie, Donald Gorrie, Robin Harper, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-769# The Black Cuillin (lodged on 20 April 2000) Tommy Sheridan*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*
S1M-769# The Black Cuillin (lodged on 20 April 2000) Dennis Canavan*, Rhoda Grant*, Maureen Macmillan*
